page.title: 16Pencoed Library
page.content: Pencoed library is a busy and interesting place. It is useful for people of all ages. There is an area for children and an area for adults. About five hundred people use the library each week. About 450 books are taken out every day. In the library there are about twenty six thousand books. There are many types of books in the library. The main librarian is Mr.Davies but several other people work there. The library is a big building and it is painted white. In the library there is a reference section, reference books being books that can not be taken out. The library is useful for people to research in if they are doing a project for the school. In the library you are not allowed to eat sweets or chocolates.
